movies.title: Hemligheten
movies.plot: Eleven-year-old Johannes is found dead in a barn after he has been sexually abused. Lindman is charged with telling the father, whom he knows from a local shooting club, but is taken off the case for previous unprofessional contact and pursues his own investigations. The prime suspect, a man seen chatting to Johannes at a supermarket, is found dead but his neighbour, an ex-policeman, had already arrested a similar child killer years earlier. As the investigation continues, it is clear that child pornography is involved, reopening old memories for Lindman.
movies.simplePlot: Eleven-year-old Johannes is found dead in a barn after he has been sexually abused. Lindman is charged with telling the father, whom he knows from a local shooting club, but is taken off ...

biography.bio: Krister Henriksson was born on November 12, 1946 in Häverö, Stockholms län, Sweden as Jan Krister Allan Henriksson. He is an actor and director, known for Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005), Reconstruction (2003) and Infidèle (2000). He has been married to Cecilia Nilsson since 1988. They have one child.
biography.name: Krister Henriksson

biography.bio: Johanna Sällström was born on December 30, 1974 in Stockholm, Sweden. In 1997 she won the award Guldbaggen for best female leading role in the movie Beneath the Surface (1997), which became her big breakthrough. Getting tired off all the interest around herself she moved to Denmark where she worked at a café shop, but in year 2000 she went back to Sweden and continued her acting career. She was best known for playing the police agent Linda Wallander in Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005). Even though Johanna Sällström often played tough on the screen, it is said she was much more shy and quiet in her private life. Sällström was found dead by the police at her home in Malmö, Sweden on 13th of February 2007.
biography.name: Johanna Sällström

biography.bio: Ola Rapace was born on December 3, 1971 in Tyresö, Stockholms län, Sweden as Pär Ola Norell. He is an actor and producer, known for Skyfall (2012), Beyond (2010) and Together (2000). He was previously married to Noomi Rapace.
biography.name: Ola Rapace

biography.bio: Fredrik Gunnarsson was born on September 4, 1965 in Oxelösund, Östergötlands län, Sweden. He is an actor, known for Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005), Show Me Love (1998) and Lycka till och ta hand om varandra (2012).
biography.name: Fredrik Gunnarsson

biography.bio: Mats Bergman was born on May 5, 1948 in Gothenburg, Västra Götalands län, Sweden. He is an actor, known for Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005), Evil (2003) and Den ofrivillige golfaren (1991).
biography.name: Mats Bergman

biography.bio: Stina Ekblad was born on February 26, 1954 in Solf, Finland. She is an actress, known for Love Is All You Need (2012), Hjälp! (2007) and Une solution rationnelle (2009).
biography.name: Stina Ekblad

biography.bio: Chatarina Larsson was born on April 2, 1947 in Stockholm, Sweden. She is an actress, known for Mr. Ove (2015), Nu är pappa trött igen (1996) and Cockpit (2012).
biography.name: Chatarina Larsson

biography.bio: Ulf Friberg was born on October 4, 1962 in Nässjö, Jönköpings län, Sweden. He is an actor and director, known for The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo (2011), Evil (2003) and Jerusalem (1996).
biography.name: Ulf Friberg

biography.bio: Claes-Göran Turesson was born on January 7, 1947 in Helsingborg, Skåne län, Sweden as Clas-Göran Turesson. He is an actor, known for Daybreak (2003), Executive Protection (2001) and Call Girl (2012).
biography.name: Claes-Göran Turesson

biography.bio: Ing-Marie Carlsson was born on February 25, 1957 in Jönköping, Jönköpings län, Sweden as Ing-Marie Gunilla Jessica Carlsson. She is an actress, known for Tre kronor (1994), My Life as a Dog (1985) and Julens hjältar (1999).
biography.name: Ing-Marie Carlsson

biography.bio: Anders Ahlbom was born on May 18, 1947 in Malmö, Skåne län, Sweden. He is an actor, known for The Girl Who Kicked the Hornet's Nest (2009), The Girl Who Played with Fire (2009) and SOS (1988).
biography.name: Anders Ahlbom

biography.bio: Lennart Jähkel was born on September 27, 1956 in Piteå, Norrbottens län, Sweden as Carl Gustav Lennart Jähkel. He is known for his work on c/o Segemyhr (1998), As It Is in Heaven (2004) and The Hunters (1996).
biography.name: Lennart Jähkel

biography.bio: Sven Strömersten-Holm is an actor and director, known for I lagens namn (1986), The Lake (1999) and Truth About Men (2010).
biography.name: Sven Strömersten-Holm

biography.bio: Rolf Degerlund was born on December 8, 1952 in Råneå, Norrbottens län, Sweden. He is an actor, known for The Girl Who Kicked the Hornet's Nest (2009), The Hunters (1996) and Wolf (2008).
biography.name: Rolf Degerlund

biography.bio: Hampus Edfeldt is an actor, known for Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005).
biography.name: Hampus Edfeldt
